body:
on `git pull` i get:
```
Updating b13b253..2fcac22
git: 'lfs' is not a git command. See 'git --help'.

Did you mean this?
	log
error: external filter git lfs smudge %f failed 1
error: external filter git lfs smudge %f failed
fatal: lib/spack/docs/tutorial/Spack-SC16-Tutorial.pdf: smudge filter lfs failed
```

Supposedly introduced in https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/2334
title: problems with git lfs
